Detailed Description

Keyboard.

Keyboard is the APOXI device abstraction interface for keyboard hardware driver.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum Keyboard::Flag
 

Enumerator:
KeyDown 
KeyUp 
LongKeyPress 
VeryLongKeyPress 
KeyAutoRepeat 
InputChar 

enum Keyboard::IlluminationMode
 

Enumerator:
IlluminationModeOff 
IlluminationModeAuto  Illumination is continuously off.
IlluminationModeOn  Illumination is continuously on.

Illumination is on as long ReactivateIllumination is called and turns off automatically after the adjusted timeout given by SetIlluminationTimeout.

virtual void Keyboard::OnStart (   )  [protected, virtual]
 

Is invoked by the DeviceManager when the system is started. The device must attach itself to the DeviceManager by invoking DeviceManager::AddDevice(*this) in its constructor.

Reimplemented from AbstractDevice.

void Keyboard::ReactivateIllumination (   )  [static]
 

Call this method for example on each key press to turn on the keyboard illumination. Then it automatically turns off the keyboard illumination after the adjusted timeout.
